allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix HORTINO Leżajsk location - correct province and coordinates

- Changed province from "mazowieckie" to "podkarpackie"
- Changed county from "nieznany" to "leżajski"
- Fixed coordinates from [52.024, 21.136] to [50.260, 22.417]

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ESLint errors - remove unused variables and imports

- Remove unused imports \(parseString, axios, axiosRateLimit\)
- Remove unused types and functions \(XMLType processing functions\)
- Remove unused helper functions \(geocodeAddress, saveToCache, etc.\)
- Remove unused DataSource type and dataSource state variable
- Add eslint-disable comments where needed

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
